text: Wise Blood is a 1979 American German comedy-drama movie directed by John Huston (who also stars) and is based on the 1952 novel of the same name by Flannery O'Connor. Also starring Brad Dourif, Dan Shor, Mary Nell Santacroce, Harry Dean Stanton, Amy Wright, Ned Beatty and was distributed by New Life Cinema. ==Other websites== * * Category:1979 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:German comedy movies Category:German drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John Huston
title: Wise Blood (movie)
